review: I really like this great little device.  It has freed me from needing cables and I can take my tablet to my basement where we have another TV, and use it for watching movies while I do laundry.  Or play videos to exercise.

review: Chromecast is awesome!! We didn't know how much we wanted it until we got it. Quite a few channels allow you to chromecast from their apps which is really convenient. I am hoping that with time more channels upgrade to use chromecast. Very small USB, takes pretty much no space and it keeps one channel open to cast. One can cast from a specific app or from a browser, or even from your photo library on your android device. very cool! I love technology!!
author: Rosa
